r.d: Ice is a PHP framework frozen in C extension.
r.n: - Composer, update zephir to 0.12.18 - Add the image component - Dump, recursion fix #265 - PHP 7.0, drop support - Code cleanup - Update prototypes - Flash, add dismissible class - Dispatcher, continue if before returns a value - Update zephir parser to 1.3.4 - Websocket, long message fix #262
